SELECT DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(pay_time / 1000)) AS date , IFNULL(SUM(amount), 0) AS total FROM PAYMENT_INFO WHERE status = 'paid' AND pay_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) * 1000 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(pay_time / 1000), '%Y-%m') AS date , IFNULL(SUM(amount), 0) AS total FROM PAYMENT_INFO WHERE status = 'paid' AND pay_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)) * 1000 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT c.category_name AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(p.amount), 0) AS total FROM CATEGORY c LEFT JOIN CATEGORY sub ON sub.parent_idx = c.category_idx AND sub.depth = 2 LEFT JOIN CLASS cls ON cls.category_idx = sub.category_idx LEFT JOIN RESERVATION r ON r.class_idx = cls.class_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM PAYMENT_INFO WHERE status = 'paid' AND FROM_UNIXTIME(pay_time / 1000, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') ) p ON p.reservation_idx = r.reservation_idx WHERE c.depth = 1 GROUP BY c.category_name
